text: nabivarun (magin obagē mutun mittan) veta allāh porondu labā gat avasthāvēdī (ovunṭa) “dharmayada, gnānayada mā obaṭa labā dī ættemi. (min) pasuvada oba ata æti dæya satyaya karana ek nabivarayeku pæmiṇennē nam ohuva oba ættenma viśvāsa kara, niyata vaśayenma ohuṭa udav kaḷa yutuya” (yayi pævasīmen anaturuva “meya) obat sthīra karannehuda? magē mema niyōgaya piḷi gattehuda?”yi vimasumaṭa, ovun “api (eya) bāra gattemu” yayima pævasūha. eyaṭa (deviyan “meyaṭa) oba sākṣi daranu. mamat oba samaga sākṣikaruvangen keneku bavaṭa siṭinnemi” yayi pævasuvēya
